name: INVOICE_ITEM
footer detail: if(TRANCODE == '#' and MARKET_CODE=='   ') TRAILER_TYPE TRAILER; if (!(TRANCODE == '#' and MARKET_CODE == 'Sta')&&!(TRANCODE == '#' and MARKET_CODE=='   '))

column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: HEADER
column.comment: Header Data

column.name: TRAILER
column.comment: Footer Data

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For those from himself or from others to him

column.name: ENT_SEQ_NO
column.comment: Entry Sequence Number

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: BILL_SEQ_NO
column.comment: Sequential invoice number in which the conversation or data transfer occurs

column.name: INV_TYPE
column.comment: The attribute defines the type of invoice item under which the charge is summarized. Valid values: B - Billing, D - Deposit, E - Equipment Deposit, R - Refund, Q - Equipment (RMS).

column.name: INV_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: The date when the invoice item was created.

column.name: INV_DUE_DATE
column.comment: The date on which payment of the invoice is due or the invoice amount is collected. This date is also printed on the customer invoice.

column.name: INV_STATUS
column.comment: The status of the invoice item. Valid values: "O" = open (not fully paid), "C" = closed, "X" = cancelled, "P" = pending.

column.name: INV_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: The date when the INVOICE_STATUS was last changed.

column.name: SOURCE_APPL_ID
column.comment: The code of the application that initiated the invoice creation.

column.name: EU_CHARGES_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of all the charges and credits (excluding tax) recorded in the invoice item, in Euro.

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: Participant number

column.name: CARRY_OVER_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the balance of this bill may be added to the next bill without an additional charge for late payment. Carry over is usually applied when the amount to be paid is less than the minimum payable amount according to the market policy. Valid

column.name: DEP_PAID_DATE
column.comment: The last date when a payment was made to cover the deposit requirement.

column.name: DEP_RETURN_DATE
column.comment: The date on which a deposit is returned by the deposit return process.

column.name: DEP_CANCEL_DATE
column.comment: The date on which a deposit is cancelled by the deposit cancel process.

column.name: DEP_RETURN_MTHD
column.comment: The method by which the deposit is returned. Valid values: "O" = cover open debt, "E" = excess amount refunded, "R" = full refund, "Blank" = not relevant, "P" = partial deposit return.

column.name: CANCEL_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the invoice was cancelled.

column.name: CANCEL_RSN_CODE
column.comment: Reason code for cancellation reason.

column.name: RUN_DATE
column.comment: The date when the invoice item is updated.

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: RMS_INV_STORE_ID
column.comment: The ID of the RMS store as it appears on the invoice.

column.name: RMS_INV_ID
column.comment: The ID of the RMS reference as it appears on the invoice.

column.name: RMS_INV_ACTV_TYPE
column.comment: The RMS activity that creates the charge.

column.name: PYM_EXP_IND
column.comment: Indicates a future payment for the RMS invoice.

column.name: PARTITION_ROOT_BAN
column.comment: The ID of the ROOT BAN used for oracle partitioning. For a hierarchical BAN, this is the CURRENT_ROOT_BAN. Otherwise, it is the BAN.

column.name: EU_BILL_CREDIT_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of the credits (excluding tax) granted by the billing process or the credits generated during the month and held until the billing day, in Euro.

column.name: EU_BILL_DISC_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of the discounts (excluding tax) granted by the billing process to the bill for which the invoice item is created, in Euro.

column.name: EU_TOT_PYM_CRD_AMT
column.comment: The Euro amount of the invoice item which is covered by a payment applied to the invoice item. This amount is detailed by the active CDL entries related to Payments (which are related to the invoice item).

column.name: EU_TOT_GEN_CRD_AMT
column.comment: The Euro amount of the invoice item (excluding tax) which is covered by an "account level" adjustment applied to the invoice item as cash.

column.name: EU_ADJUSTED_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of adjustments applied to the charges (excluding appropriate tax amounts), which are related to the invoice item, in Euro.

column.name: EU_INV_ADJUST_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of adjustments (excluding tax) applied to the messages related to the invoice item, but not related to any of the charges which are accumulated under the invoice item. The amount is in Euro.

column.name: EU_TAX_TOT_ADJ_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of taxes, in Euro, accumulated from immediate adjustments that were given to an invoice item.

column.name: EU_TAX_TOT_INV_AMT
column.comment: The total amount, in Euro, of taxes accumulated to the invoice charges.

column.name: EU_DEP_PAID_AMT
column.comment: The amount of the deposit invoice item, in Euro, which is covered by a payment applied to the invoice item. This amount is detailed by the active CDL entries related to payments which are related to the invoice item.

column.name: EU_DEP_RETURN_AMT
column.comment: The deposit amount, in Euro, returned by the deposit return process to the customer or to cover open debts.

column.name: EU_DEP_CANCEL_AMT
column.comment: The deposit amount, in Euro, cancelled by the deposit cancel process to the customer.

column.name: EU_INTR_RTRN_AMT
column.comment: The returned interest, in Euro, on the returned deposit amount.

column.name: EU_LT_PYM_NOT_ELIG
column.comment: The attribute defines the type of invoice item under which the charge is summarized. Valid values: B - Billing, D - Deposit, E - Equipment Deposit, R - Refund, Q - Equipment (RMS).

column.name: EU_LT_ADJ_NOT_ELIG
column.comment: The total amount, in Euro, of all the adjustments applied to the charges which are related to the invoice item and which are not eligible for late payment penalty.

column.name: EU_GROSS_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of all the charges (including tax) recorded in the invoice item, in Euro.

column.name: EU_WRITE_OFF_AMT
column.comment: The total Euro amount of all write off.

column.name: EU_CHARGES_VAT_AMT
column.comment: The total Euro VAT amount of all charges accumulated into the invoice.

column.name: EU_BILL_CRD_VAT_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of the credits (excluding tax) granted by the billing process or the credits generated during the month and held until the billing day, in Euro.

column.name: EU_BILL_DSC_VAT_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of the discounts (excluding tax) granted by the billing process to the bill for which the invoice item is created, in Euro.

column.name: EU_ETF_AMT
column.comment: Early Termination Fee Amount

column.name: EU_ETF_VAT_AMT
column.comment: Early Termination Fee Tax Amount

column.name: EU_HWI_AMT
column.comment: HWI activity amounts of the charge/adjustment/discount

column.name: EU_HWI_VAT_AMT
column.comment: HWI tax amounts of the charge/adjustment/discount.

column.name: newline
column.comment: N/A
